#summary How to install the Crypt class?
#labels Phase-Deploy

== Installing from the web ==

Installing the [http://cryptclass.googlecode.com/files/cryptclass_v2.2.tar.bz2 tar.bz2 package]:

{{{
$ wget http://cryptclass.googlecode.com/files/cryptclass_v2.2.tar.bz2
$ tar xvjpf cryptclass_v2.2.tar.bz2
$ cp -r cryptclass_v2.2 /var/www/your_working_path
}}}

Installing the [http://cryptclass.googlecode.com/files/cryptclass_v2.2.tar.gz tar.gz package]:

{{{
$ wget http://cryptclass.googlecode.com/files/cryptclass_v2.2.tar.bz2
$ tar xvjpf cryptclass_v2.2.tar.bz2
$ cp -r cryptclass_v2.2 /var/www/your_working_path
}}}
